data.title: Daily Report February 09 2022
data.text:
1. On 02/08/ 2022, the Israeli occupation forces detained the citizen: Ahmed Shweiki - a resident of the city of Jerusalem.

2. The detainee in the town of Abu Dis is: Abd al-Rahman Iyad Halabiya.

At 08:00, groups of extremist Israeli settlers, under the protection of the Israeli occupation police, stormed the courtyards of Al-Aqsa Mosque, and made provocative tours of its courtyards and facilities.

At 06:50, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint at the entrance to the village of Nabi Saleh, to search vehicles and check the identities of the citizens.

1. At 03:35 on 08.02.2022, the Israeli occupation forces detained the citizen: Ammar Al-Tirawi during their raid into Jalazon camp (in addition to what was mentioned in the previous report).

2. At 11:00, the Israeli occupation forces positioned near the village of Burqa detained the citizen: Farid Abd Maatan.

At 16:55, the Israeli occupation forces positioned near the gate of the racist separation wall in the vicinity of the town of Qafin, fired stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning.

1. At 09:30, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint near the entrance to the village of Ezbet Al-Tabib, to search vehicles and check the identities of the citizens.

2. At 20:10, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint on the road between the towns of Jayyous and Azzoun, to search vehicles and check the identities of citizens.

At 18:35, the Israeli occupation forces raided the village of Al-Funduq, where clashes took place with the citizens and as a result a citizen was injured, and withdrew at 19:30.

1. At 16:25, the Israeli occupation forces positioned near the northern entrance to Azzoun town, fired stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning.

2. At 18:35, during their raid into Al-Fanduq village, the Israeli occupation forces fired rubber-coated metal bullets, stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning and as a result injuring a citizen.

At 13:15, a special Israeli Military force stormed the city of Nablus and opened fire towards a private vehicle (with the aim of assassination) and as a result killed 3civilians (whom the occupation forces describe as wanted persons), and a detained citizen.

1. At 13:15, a special Israeli Military force stormed the city of Nablus opened fire at a private vehicle (with the aim of assassination), which led to the death of 3 civilians.

2. At 18:50, the Israeli occupation forces positioned near the entrance to the village of Burqa fired rubber-coated metal bullets, stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning and as a result , injured a citizen, and detained a the National Security Force officer.

1. The detainee in the city of Nablus is: Hazem Abu Zahra.

2. The detainee during confrontations with the Israeli occupation forces near the entrance to the village of Burqa is: Al-Askari - Amer Imad Abu Hussein.

At 21:25, a group of Israeli settlers was present in the vicinity of the Za'tara Junction Checkpoint, and threw stones at the vehicles of citizens passing through the checkpoint.

1. At 16:25, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint at the entrance to the village of Shawawra, to search vehicles and check the identities of citizens until 17:55.

2. At 19:15, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint near the junction of the Nashash area (the southern entrance to the city of Bethlehem), to search vehicles and check the identities of citizens until 19:50.

1. At 17:45, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint at the entrance to the town of Beit Awa, to search vehicles and check the identities of the citizens.

2. At 17:55, the Israeli occupation forces set up a checkpoint at the junction of Khurasa village, to search vehicles and check the identities of citizens.

1. At 19:45, the Israeli occupation forces in Bab Al-Zawiya area in Hebron city fired stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning.

2. At 23:00, the Israeli occupation forces positioned near the entrance to Al-Fawwar camp fired stun and tear gas canisters towards citizens for alleged stoning.

At 19:35, a group of Israeli settlers was near the entrance to the "Kiryat Arba" settlement, east of Hebron, and threw stones at Palestinian vehicles passing by.

• At 02:00 on 05/21/ 2021, the comprehensive ceasefire entered into force at the initiative and sponsorship of the Arab Republic of Egypt.

• On the morning of 07/30/ 2021, the Israeli occupation forces allowed the expansion of the marine fishing area from 9 nautical miles to 12 nautical miles.

• The Israeli occupation forces violated the ceasefire agreement by firing from their positions on the Green Line towards Khan Yunis governorate.
